title-group.article-title: The Design and Testing of a Mixed-flow Turbine for Turbochargers

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1990 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: In order to improve turbocharger turbine efficiency at high specific speed, a prototype mixed-flow turbine was designed, fabricated and tested at the Garrett Automotive Group of Allied-Signal. The steady-ñow performance of the mixed-flow turbine was obtained from combustion gas stands with divided and undivided nozzleless volute turbine housings. The mixed-flow turbine with a divided turbine housing was also tested on a diesel engine. Significant turbine and engine performance improvements were observed with the mixed-flow turbine.
